channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023120863
item.description:
Report X-2023120863

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived to station by trailer. Once pulled off it was isolated and QA was notified. The package was inspected, all info was taken for necessary reports, and the product was sealed in a drum for necessary transport once disposition is received. DescribePack: loose seal on lid of inner container DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was isolated in hazmat cage and placed in drum once properly inspected

item.title: Report X-2023120649
item.description:
Report X-2023120649

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found during outbound sort, immediately placed in a red hazmat bin with a liner and brought to QA for evaluation of package. DescribePack: The plastic bottle has a loose lid and contents leaked into package. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery, the package was placed in a red hazmat bin to contain leakage; area was looked over to make sure it was cleaned up.
